column5: Our cool and comfortable 2-story house gives you a peaceful and safe place to stay just like home. The private room comfortably fits 2 and is centrally located on a quite street, with a super nice neighborhood. 10 minutes away from Katy Mills Mall, Tyhoon Texas Waterpark, grocery and other restaurants and bars nearby. Me and my hubby would love to meet and host you for a comfortable stay in our bright and clean room.
